query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 ( MANDT, PSPID, POSID, INPT, SEQNO, GUBUN, BIGO, CDATE, CNAME, CTIME, AUTO_DEL
) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #PSPID#, #PSPID#||'L01', 'D', ( SELECT SAPHEE.FILLINZERO(INT(VALUE(MAX(SEQNO),'0'))+1,3) AS SEQNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID = #PSPID# AND POSID = #PSPID#||'L01' AND INPT = 'D' ), 'C', '준비상태 : '||#BIGO#, hex(current date), #G_USER_ID#, HEX(CURRENT TIME), #AUTO_DEL# )
